name: Antidote
description: Cures poisoning. If taken as a preventative, prevents poisoning for one hour.

name: Flask of Oil
description: Contains approximately one pint. Fuels a lantern for 12 hours.

name: Holy Water
description: Contains 1 cup of water blessed by a priest. Deals 3d8 holy damage when thrown.

name: Drinking Water
description: 1 Gallon of potable water for cooking and drinking.

name: Rations
description: Consists of non-perishable food items for a single day's sustenance.

name: Salt, 1 cup
description: For flavor, and curing meat. And driving off foul spirits.

name: Sugar, 1 cup
description: For sweeting cakes, or as a currency when trading with savages.

name: Tobacco
description: 1 pound. Emits a thick smoke when lit, agreeable to some and noxious to others.

name: Wine, Bottle of
description: A finer drink, favored by nobles and kings.

name: Mead, Bottle of
description: Made from honey. Sweeter than beer.

name: Beer, Bottle of
description: Proof that the gods love us and want us to be happy.

name: Moonshine, Flask of
description: Extremely strong alcohol. Lacks the royal stamp, indicating that is has been manufactured illegally.

name: Rum, Bottle of
description: Manufactured from sugarcane. Favored by sailors, accordingly.
